summary: A brief email from Anthony, a Special Assistant United States Attorney for the Eastern District of Virginia, to an unnamed recipient, expressing support for their work on the Epstein case and acknowledging its importance.

persons.name: Anthony
persons.context: The sender of the email, who expresses support for the recipient's work on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An email was sent on July 8, 2019, regarding the Epstein case.
The sender, Anthony, is a Special Assistant United States Attorney for the Eastern District of Virginia.
The email expresses that the Epstein case is seen as 'excellent and very important'.
The recipient of the email is not named in the provided text.
